features: 【Large size & Help Relieve Pain】gel seat cushion size is 18 x 17 x 1.45 inch, weight about 2.6lb.Double-layer gel cushion design. Not only thicker, but also more comfortable effectively prevent and alleviate various pain symptoms, including tailbone problems, lumbar strain, sciatica, and degenerative disc disease.
【Breathability and heat dissipation】Our seat cushion adopt a honeycomb design, and the built-in free-flowing air channel prevents the seat from sweating and maintains comfortable heat dissipation.

【Super soft & hard to deform】The gel cushion has cushioning property that it does not break even if you put an egg and sit down. In addition, it is characterized by highly elastic gel material, it restores to its original shape as soon as it is stretched and squeezed and has superior durability than a conventional cushion.
【Applicable scope】Chair pad is great for office, home, travel, car seat, or wheelchair use, suitable as gifts for family, friends, and colleagues.
【Zipper design, easy to clean】The zipper design and detachable seat cover can better clean the gel seat cushion. This way you can use the seat cushion without worrying about soiling the seat.

According to research and customer feedback, gel cushions are effective for the following situations: Back pain and sciatica pain relief Cars, travel, office work Injured tailbone Lumbar disc herniation Pregnant woman Wheelchair users

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Omcozy This gel cushion is designed to provide people with a more comfortable life. Many people in modern society suffer from various occupational diseases such as cervical spondylosis, lumbar disc herniation, Coccyx pain, etc., using our ergonomic gel cushion can effectively relieve pain. In addition, it is also very suitable for pregnant women and wheelchair users.

FEATURES Very soft Pressure relief Anti-slip base Washable cover Built to last Multi-scene application EFFECTIVELY RELIEVE THE PAIN OF VARIOUS DISEASES If you spend significant time sitting in your office, car, or home– a proper seat cushion can make a world of difference. According to research and customer feedback, gel cushions are effective for the following situations: Back pain and sciatica pain relief Cars, travel, office work Injured tailbone Lumbar disc herniation Pregnant woman Wheelchair users

Excellent Breathability & Good Practicality The Gel seat cushion pad with a " Honeycomb structure", so it have a nice breath ability ,Can circulate air, even if you sitting for a long time, it can still Keep fresh and comfortable at all days; Besides, the elastic gel material will keep its original shape all time and it won't lose its support. Double Layer Thickness Double layer thickness, makes it enough to support any weight of the body without limitation. Increase size 18*17*1.45inch, As well as sitting, it reduces the burden of kneeling when doing housework. Can protect your lover's knees well, The seat cushion can be as a gift for holidays, birthdays and honorable days to your own family and friends.

Non-Slip Bottom Please put the bump with anti-slip function towards the bottom, so that the anti-slip block can rub against the chair to fix the position and not slide easily. The anti-slip bottom prevents it from slipping on most chairs. And the cushion is pretty suitable for office chairs, car chairs, wheelchairs, sofa and so on. Durable Zipper A built zipper is on the side of the removable cover, you just need to open the zipper and put the cover in the washing machine for cleaning. Machine-washable & Easy Cleaning Machine-washable and zippered Gel Chair Seat Cushion is easy to clean. The gel seat is light and portable in your home, office, wheelchair, and a favorite movie at the theater.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Comfy Office Chair Cushion is at Last at an End !
reviews.reviewText: The foam cushion I have used for 3 years is finally worn out completely so my quest began. I ordered a gel office seat that was hyped up during Amazon Prime day on promotion, the thing was like sitting on a rock! It GAVE butt ache. Next, I tried an intermediate cushion, some gel some foam - blah, and too thin, I could feel the chair and found myself standing rather than sitting just so as not to be on it. Now this one arrived today and I feel like Goldilocks, it's just right.The Pros: soft enough to sit on that does not make you sore, helps me in sitting up straighter without feeling like I'm "perching" on it, fits my office chair perfectly ( mines a usual size regular office-type bought at Staples) better than the gel one with the "cut out" U shape that made me feel I could spill over the sides if not centered right. I Have sat on a "purple" one at a store as I considered a "purple" but too expensive, and to my mind, this is every bit as good without the hefty price, in fact, it's better because it doesn't have that weird wobble I thought the purple one had. Maybe that's down to it having a cover (the store sample "purple" did not have a cover on). It does not squish down and I don't think it will, and for me, it's a keeper. The Cons: The box it arrived in had clearly been opened and I suspect someone else had returned it, came with no paperwork, cover already on ( maybe that's standard? for other two cushions the cover had come as separate in the box for me to insert and zip). But it doesn't matter if it's a "return" from someone else because quality is fine and I'm not returning. Another reviewer mentioned the smell and because I had read about it I smelled it - yes, it does have a chemical smell. But only if you put it up to your face, I'm sitting on it now and can't smell in usual use. Anyway, likely to wear off in time. I don't particularly like the feel of the ( cheap material) cover, so thin - on the other hand, same as the other cushions covers were, anyway I have wrapped it in a comfy small fleece blanket that the dog isn't using in his bed ( !) and this means it feels soft to sit on. Maybe that will affect the "cooling" that it's supposed to create through the eggbox airholes, but I didn't care about that feature, my office is cool, and needing air circulation in my cushion just isn't important to me - I wanted the support and comfort. I have sat on it for several hours today writing a long document and like it so much I will probably get some more for our kitchen chairs now we spend much longer around the family dinner table ( what with all the gourmet cooking we learned during COVID and better meals with appetizers etc that my fam. now regard as standard!). I Will update this review if doesn't hold up but my last one (a weak bit of foam bought on a whim in fabric store sale) was good enough for several years so I'm hoping it will provide years of comfort.For the price and the product, I wouldn't hesitate. It also says something that I came on and wrote a review because normally I don't bother unless particularly impressed or disappointed and I order quite a bit on Amazon ( not a paid reviewer or employee or anything).Good luck with finding the perfect one for you, I hope my views help with your decision, even though it's not an overly expensive item comfort can make a big difference to your office day so it's important to get it as right as you can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blissful Seating Upgrade
reviews.reviewText: As a software developer accustomed to long hours in my office chair, finding the perfect seating arrangement is crucial. The Cooling Gel Seat Cushion, with its thick, big, breathable honeycomb design, has emerged as the ultimate solution to elevate the comfort of my PatioMage Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair.**Softening the Seat (5/5):**Straight out of the box, the PatioMage chair's seat cushion leaned towards the firmer side, providing a breathable but less-than-ideal level of softness for extended use. The Cooling Gel Seat Cushion, with its plush honeycomb design, introduced the perfect balance. The thickness and softness of the cushion add a layer of comfort that transforms the seating experience.**Breathable Design (5/5):**The honeycomb structure of the gel seat cushion not only contributes to its thickness but also enhances breathability. This feature is particularly beneficial during long periods of sitting, preventing discomfort from heat buildup. The cushion allows for optimal air circulation, keeping things cool and comfortable.**Relief for Prolonged Sitting (5/5):**The gel-infused design of the cushion provides excellent support and relief, especially for those prone to discomfort during extended sitting sessions. As a software developer, the Cooling Gel Seat Cushion has become an essential accessory for ensuring I can focus on my work without the distraction of discomfort.**Perfect Fit for PatioMage Chair (5/5):**The dimensions of the Cooling Gel Seat Cushion make it a perfect fit for the PatioMage chair. It seamlessly enhances the overall seating experience, turning a good chair into an exceptional one. The cushion stays in place and adds just the right amount of softness without compromising support.**Versatile Application (5/5):**While specifically acquired to enhance the PatioMage chair, the Cooling Gel Seat Cushion's versatile design makes it suitable for various seating surfaces. Whether used in an office chair, car seat, or any other chair with similar dimensions, the cushion provides consistent and reliable comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have hypermobile joints and work long hours at my desk. The compacted foam in my vintage chair made my lower back (spine), hips and knees hurt after sitting for about 15 minutes. I'm glad I gave this type of seat cushion a try! It's not the softest, butg that's what I was looking for- not super squishy memory foam. It's pretty supportive while also quite squishy. The size is great. The cover is on the flimsy side, and it does not keep the cushion from slipping around at all. The somewhat disappointing cover, and the fact that I paid a little extra to have a green cushion but was sent a sky blue one = four stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my old office chair
reviews.reviewText: My chair in my office is very old, has no support or cushion, and is very uncomfortable. I ordered this cushion to fix the problem, and it helped so much. My chair is so much more comfortable now as I spend most of my day sitting at my desk. It is the perfect size to cover the seat of my chair, and the cover zips off for easy washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the product, not the packaging
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I love this product! It is extremely supportive and comfortable. However, I’m rating it low due to inconsistent packaging. I ordered a 2nd one for a present. Unlike the 1st one, the 2nd one was in an unsealed box and was not in a plastic bag. It could have been handled or used by anyone. I can’t give it as a present in that condition and I’m afraid to order another one. It’s too much trouble to return it so I’m keeping it as a spare (after I sanitize it). I don’t know if this is Amazon’s fault or the manufacturer’s but the packaging should be sealed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives great relief on legs fro long hours sitting
reviews.reviewText: I love the texture and the anti slip cover .Highly recommend if you need relieve on the vein legs circulation at the office or home! I will get a second one soon for my home office. I am taking this to work and bringing it back for the home office. Wise purchase. Worth the investment!

reviews.reviewerName: Excelente!!! Tiene unos plásticos qué se encajan en el patio de los vidrios muy útiles...

reviews.reviewText: Cumple su función y esta a buen precio
Bem confortável, com um bom tamanho para cadeiras grandes. Estou bem satisfeito com a compra.

I am quite small but do a lot of driving for work and as I am quite bony my butt was sore after ~3 hours driving. This has changed everything!!! I recently drove over 38 hours with NO ISSUES! It not only cushions my boney butt but during the heatwave it kept me cool! LOVE IT!!
Rende la seduta morbida e allevia il dolore
